title: 27+ Shield VFX Elements
description: I present to your attention Shield VFX Elements made in niagara system in this asset pack more than 27 special effects for your projects. Is a dynamic and action-animation template that includes a unique collection with customization options.
longDescription:
👇

Video Preview:https://youtu.be/9KG3OQ6VRlU


I present to your attention Shield VFX Elements made in niagara system in this asset pack more than 27 special effects for your projects. Is a dynamic and action-animation template that includes a unique collection with customization options.

- All material provided in this package is completely made from scratch and is absolutely unique, both meshes and textures 

- You can change the color of any element in real time, as well as add a glow to any of the layers.

- This package contains all the elements for your project, you can combine them as you see fit.

Features:

● All elements are made in niagara system.

● Optimized for games.

●It works just as good in 2D than in 3D.

● Pivot point set properly.

● No setup or plug-ins required.

● All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.

● Each element has its own special material for textures, flipbooks and meshes.

● The color and glow in each element layer can be changed in 2 clicks in the Niagara system
technicalDetails:
Specifications:

● File formats: transparent Png.

● Frame rate: 30 FPS

● Proper name for all elements


Number of unique effects: 27

Number of material instances: 2

Number of materials: 95

Number of textures: 69

Number of meshes: 2

Supported development platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
